key_talking_points: Edmonton's Darnell Nurse (8477932) assessed a minor penalty for holding the stick at 17:06 remaining in the first period. Florida will go on the power play.
The Florida Panthers are currently leading the Edmonton Oilers 5-4 with 17:03 remaining in the first period. Florida has 42 shots on goal to Edmonton's 46.
for_commentary_agent.context: The Oilers take a penalty while trailing by one. Focus on the upcoming power play and the impact on the game. Mention the high shot totals for both teams.

high_intensity_events.summary: Darnell Nurse penalized for holding the stick, giving Florida a power play.
Carter Verhaeghe (8470621) shot on goal saved by Stuart Skinner (8475683)

task_details.specific_guidance: Monitor the Florida power play and Edmonton's penalty kill strategy.
